13 PrvWithoutDesuperheating::PrvWithoutDesuperheating(const double inletPressure,
14  const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity quantityType,
15  const double quantityValue, const double inletMassFlow,
16  const double outletPressure)
17  : inletPressure(inletPressure), quantityValue(quantityValue), inletMassFlow(inletMassFlow),
18  outletPressure(outletPressure), quantityType(quantityType)
19 {
20  calculateProperties();
21 }
22 
23 void PrvWithoutDesuperheating::calculateProperties() {
24  inletProperties = SteamProperties(inletPressure, quantityType, quantityValue).calculate();
25  outletProperties = SteamProperties(outletPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTHALPY,
26  inletProperties.specificEnthalpy).calculate();
27  inletEnergyFlow = inletProperties.specificEnthalpy * inletMassFlow;
28 }
29 
30 PrvWithDesuperheating::PrvWithDesuperheating(const double inletPressure,
31  const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity quantityType,
32  const double quantityValue, const double inletMassFlow,
33  const double outletPressure, const double feedwaterPressure,
34  const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity feedwaterQuantityType,
35  const double feedwaterQuantityValue, const double desuperheatingTemp)
36  : PrvWithoutDesuperheating(inletPressure, quantityType, quantityValue, inletMassFlow, outletPressure),
37  feedwaterPressure(feedwaterPressure),
38  feedwaterQuantityValue(feedwaterQuantityValue), desuperheatingTemp(desuperheatingTemp),
39  feedwaterQuantityType(feedwaterQuantityType)
40 {
41  calculateProperties();
42 }
43 
44 void PrvWithDesuperheating::calculateProperties() {
45  inletProperties = SteamProperties(inletPressure, quantityType, quantityValue).calculate();
46  feedwaterProperties = SteamProperties(feedwaterPressure, feedwaterQuantityType, feedwaterQuantityValue).calculate();
47  outletProperties= SteamProperties(outletPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::TEMPERATURE,
48  desuperheatingTemp).calculate();
49 
50  inletEnergyFlow = inletProperties.specificEnthalpy * inletMassFlow;
51  feedwaterMassFlow = inletMassFlow * (inletProperties.specificEnthalpy - outletProperties.specificEnthalpy)
52  / (outletProperties.specificEnthalpy - feedwaterProperties.specificEnthalpy);
53 
54  feedwaterEnergyFlow = feedwaterMassFlow * feedwaterProperties.specificEnthalpy;
55  outletMassFlow = inletMassFlow + feedwaterMassFlow;
56  outletEnergyFlow = outletMassFlow * outletProperties.specificEnthalpy;
57 }
